title: Lord Teemo Save My Soul
body:
I've proven before that i can hold my own against low plat players but im stuck in the forsaken hell hole that is bronze. every game i get a troll or a feeder and im done with it. someone please carry me out of bronze so i can actually enjoy the game again

Add me in-game: ConnTroller

replies.body:
I was bronze 3 and i got myself out, and right now i'm at silver 3. I made a little guide on it.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/07pLQh3p-how-i-climbed-out-of-bronze

If I bothered to actually try I never lose lane. 2 games ago I had top and bot tower gone before 10 minutes, welcome to hell, not much you can do other than premade, thank you Riot for the Dynamic Queue.

Hey buddy, wrong board. 

I would suggest posing in the "[team recruitment](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment)" board instead. 
You may be able to gold your own against plats in norms, but they don't usually try too hard there. I would suggest [getting your win rate to at least 50%](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=conntroller) and working on some skills so you can get yourself out instead of trying to get someone to carry you.

Good luck ♥
